search_engine.indexer

Class Posting

  • java.lang.Object
    • search_engine.indexer.Posting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Posting>

     class Posting
extends Object
implements Comparable<Posting>
    Posting provides a local posting, which will contains a list of document ID in which a word appear
    This class supports Comparable, which used to sort Posting based on the vocabularyId the Posting has
    Author:
    ngtrhieu0011

      Protected Constructor

      • Posting

        public Posting(int vocabularyId)
        Public Constructor
        Construct an empty Posting with a vocabularyId
        Parameters:
        vocabularyId -

      • Posting

        protected Posting(int vocabularyId,
       String postingString)
        Protected Constructor
        This is called by the Posting List to translate the Posting stored as String in file to an actual Posting object
        Parameters:
        vocabularyId - the vocabularyId of the Posting. This is denoted as the line number in the file
        postingString - the raw string from the file

    • Method Detail

      • isContainDocId

        public boolean isContainDocId(int docId)
        Check whether a docId is already inside this posting
        Parameters:
        docId -
        Returns:
        true if the docId is found inside the posting
        false if the docId is not found

      • merge

        public static Posting merge(Posting p1,
            Posting p2)
        Static Service
        Merge two Postings together
        The input Postings need to have the same vocabularyId
        Parameters:
        p1 - Posting 1
        p2 - Posting 2
        Returns:
        the merge posting, null if p1 and p2 have different vocabularyId
